name: Run Tool Tests
description: Run Jest tests for a specific tool by executing its .test.ts file. Returns test results including pass/fail status, coverage information, and detailed test output.

tool_name.description: The function_name of the tool to test

category.description: Tool category (data, agent, task, time, web, tools, workflows, storage, etc.)

target_space.description: Optional target space for space-specific tool tests
